building.model:
Frédéric Rodrigo f.rodrigo free.fr GPL
Saule pleureur Peking Willow From Wikipedia : It is a medium-sized to large deciduous tree, growing up to 20-25 m tall. It grows rapidly, but has a short lifespan. It has narrow, light green leaves, around 4-10 cm long and 1-2 cm broad. The flowers are catkins produced early in the spring; it is dioecious, with the male and female catkins on separate trees.
